remnant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small part of something that remains after the rest of it has been used, destroyed, or eaten
remnant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The remnants of a meal stood on the table.
remnant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a small piece of cloth left from a larger piece and sold cheaply
remnant.translation[1].definitions[0].de: part of something that is left after most of it has been removed, used, sold etc
remnant.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The last remnants of the troubled group have been sold.
